headline: Elon Musk Says Starship Can Deliver 300 GW Solar AI Satellites Per Year, But There's One Major 'Piece Of The Puzzle' That Stands In Its Way
summary: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has claimed that the Starship rocket can deliver 300 Gigawatt solar-powered AI satellites to orbit amid space-based data center talks. Tonnage To Orbit Solved By Starship, Says Elon Musk Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) CEO Marc Benioff took to the social media platform X on Wednesday, sharing a video of Musk talking about the cost-effectiveness of having datacenters in Orbit vs on the ground. headline: Why The Narrative Around Salesforce Is Shifting Amid AI Progress and Cloud Uncertainty
summary: Salesforce’s consensus analyst price target has been revised lower, with fair value estimates slipping from $334.68 to $330.59 per share. This adjustment reflects a blend of optimism about the company’s AI initiatives and product growth, as well as more cautious sentiment driven by subdued core cloud demand and fierce competition. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep pace with these evolving Wall Street narratives moving forward. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Salesforce shifts...
